name: SkippingIterator_removeTest
description: Unit tests for the remove method of the SkippingIterator class.

test_cases.name: testRemoveBeforeNext
test_cases.description: Tests that an IllegalStateException is thrown when remove() is called before next().

test_cases.name: testRemoveAfterNext
test_cases.description: Tests that super.remove() is called when remove() is called after next().
